title: Man shot in Wilmington during robbery attempt
location: In the area of W. 9th and N. Jefferson streets, Wilmington, DE 19801
summary:
Wilmington police said a 40-year-old man was shot Wednesday as part of a robbery attempt.

Around 8:30 p.m., police responded to St. Francis Hospital and found the man with a gunshot wound on his hand. The victim told police he was shot in a robbery attempt around 9th and Jefferson streets.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Two men shot early Saturday in Hilltop neighborood
location: In the area of 1700 block of W. 3rd St., Wilmington, DE 19805
summary:
Two men arrived at St. Francis Hospital early Saturday after being shot in Wilmington's Hilltop neighborhood.

Wilmington officers were dispatched to the 1700 block of W. Third St. in reference to a shooting shortly after 12:10 a.m. Arriving officers found evidence of a shooting, but no victims. A short time later, however, officers were called to St. Francis Hospital, where two gunshot victims had arrived in private vehicle.

At the hospital, officers found a 27-year-old man suffering from gunshot wounds to the arm and a 45-year-old man with a gunshot wound to the arm, police said. Both men were reported to be stable, according to police.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Man, 41, shot several times in the leg
location: In the area of Unit block of E. 23rd St., Wilmington, DE 19802
summary:
City officers were flagged down about 9:40 p.m. in the area of 23rd and Market streets in reference to a possible shooting victim, police said. 

At the same time a Shot Spotter alert was received for the unit block of E. 23rd Street. Officers responded to the block and found a 41-year-old man suffering from several gunshot wounds to the leg and a shooting scene.

The man was taken to Christiana Hospital where he was reported to be stable, police said.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Boy, 15, shot in legs
location: In the area of 400 block of E. Ninth St., Wilmington, DE 19801
summary:
A 15-year-old boy was shot early Tuesday in Wilmington's East Side, according to city police.

Officers were called about 1:25 a.m. to a home in the 900 block of Clifford Brown Walk for the report of a shooting victim. Arriving police found a teen with multiple gun shot wounds to his upper legs. 

The victim told officers he was shot while in the 400 block of E. Ninth St. He was treated at the scene before he was transported to Christiana Hospital, where he was listed as stable.

victims.name: Unidentified Boy
victims.status: The unidentified boy was wounded during the incident.

title: Man, 30, shot in leg in Wilmington
location: In the area of 800 Maryland Ave., Wilmington, DE 19805
summary:
A 30-year-old man was shot in the leg Thursday night.

Officers were called at about 10:40 p.m. to the 800 block of Maryland Ave. after Shot Spotter notified police of gunfire in the area.  When police arrived, residents directed them to the 1300 block of Cedar St. where a man with a gunshot wound to his right, lower leg was located.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Man shot in groin
location: In the area of W. Fourth and N. Rodney streets, Wilmington, DE 19805
summary:
A 33-year-old man was shot in the groin during an apparent robbery early Saturday, police said.

Officers were called to St. Francis Hospital after the man arrived with a gunshot wound, said Sgt. Andrea Janvier, a spokeswoman with the city police department. He was described as stable.

A preliminary investigation determined the man was walking in the area of W. Fourth St. between N. Van Buren and Rodney streets when he was approached by three people he didn't know, Janvier said. They demanded his property and the man complied, but when they tried to get more from him, he ran away.

That's when one of the robbers shot him.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: 20-year-old shot in the hand
location: In the area of 300 E. 26th St., Wilmington, DE 19802
summary:
On July 12 at about 3:20 p.m., police were told that a shooting victim who had arrived at the Wilmington Hospital Emergency Room via private vehicle. 

The victim, a 20-year-old man, was shot in his left hand and is listed in good condition. Investigators believe the shooting occurred in the area of the 300 block of E. 26th Street when a man approached the victim from behind and shot at him.  The victim ran away and was able to get a ride to the hospital.  No ShotSpotter Notification was received for this area and no crime scene could be located.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Man, 22, dies after shooting
location: In the area of 1200 block of W. Third St., Wilmington, DE 19805
summary:
A 22-year-old man was critically wounded after being shot late Friday died Sunday. 

Officers responding to the 1200 block of W. Third St. found the man suffering gunshot wounds to the facial and torso areas. 

The victim was taken to Christiana Hospital in critical condition.

victims.name: Cyree Watson
victims.status: Watson was killed during the incident.
victims.about: Victim died from his injuries on July 16, two days after shooting incident.

title: Shooting at Seventh and Monroe streets
location: In the area of W. Seventh and N. Monroe streets, Wilmington, DE 19801
summary:
A 37-year-old man is in stable condition following a shooting Sunday night.  

Investigators say the shooting happened in the area of Seventh and N. Monroe streets just after 10 p.m. when the victim was passed on foot by two male juveniles, an official said.  For an unknown reason, one of the suspects fired at the victim hitting him in the right hip and right foot, an official said.

The victim was able to stop a passing vehicle.  The motorist drove him to Wilmington Hospital, an official said.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Two shot, including 15-year-old girl
location: 1200 block of E. 27th St., Wilmington, DE 19802
summary:
Officers responded to a shooting at about 12:25 a.m. in the 1300 block of E. 27th St. and found two victims. 

The first victim was a 15-year-old girl, who was suffering a gunshot wound to her lower back area. The girl was treated by New Castle County Paramedics and taken to the Nemours/Alfred I. duPont Hospital for Children, where she was reported to be stable.

The second victim is a 30-year-old man, who was shot in the left shoulder. He was treated by paramedics before being taken to Christiana Hospital, where he also was listed as stable, Janvier said. 

Officers found a shooting scene in the 1200 block of E. 27th St.

victims.name: Unidentified Girl
victims.status: The unidentified girl was wounded during the incident.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Man shot after argument in Prices Run
location: In the area of 100 block of E. 24th St., Wilmington, DE 19802
summary:
A 29-year-old man is in stable condition after being shot following a verbal altercation, police said.

Officers responded about 10:30 a.m. to the area of E. 24th and Carter streets for a shooting investigation. Arriving officers found the 29-year-old man suffering from gunshot wounds to his right leg and left arm in the 2300 block of Carter St. 

He was treated at the scene by New Castle County Paramedics and taken to Christiana Hospital.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Woman, teen shot in 9th Ward neighborhood
location: In the area of 2400 block of N. Madison St., Wilmington, DE 19802
summary:
At about 8:45 p.m., police were called to a home in the 2400 block of N. Madison St. in reference to an apparent shooting investigation.

There, police found an 18-year-old woman and a 16-year-old boy.  Each person had been shot once in one of their legs.  Both were taken to Christiana Hospital in stable condition.

victims.name: Unidentified Woman
victims.status: The unidentified woman was wounded during the incident.

victims.name: Unidentified Boy
victims.status: The unidentified boy was wounded during the incident.

title: Man shot dead in Hedgeville
location: In the area of 700 block of S. Van Buren St., Wilmington, DE 19805
summary:
A 23-year-old man was shot dead Friday afternoon in Wilmington's Hedgeville neighborhood. 

Officers responding to the 700 block of S. Van Buren St. in reference to a shooting found a man suffering from a gunshot wound to his upper torso about 1:20 p.m.

The man was treated by New Castle County Paramedics and taken to the Christiana Hospital where he was pronounced dead.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was killed during the incident.

title: Woman found shot on Bowers St.
location: In the area of 2300 block of N. Locust St., Wilmington, DE 19802
summary:
Officers responded to the area of the 2300 block of N. Locust St. after reports of gunfire. There, they found a 29-year-old woman in the area of E. 23rd and Bowers streets. 

The woman was shot wound in her left arm. The victim was treated on scene by New Castle County Paramedics and transported to the Christiana Hospital Emergency Room in stable condition.

victims.name: Unidentified Woman
victims.status: The unidentified woman was wounded during the incident.

title: Man shot in the hip
location: In the area of N. Pine and E. 23rd streets, Wilmington, DE 19802
summary:
Police say a 35-year-old man was walking in area of E. 23rd and N. Pine streets when gunfire erupted.

The victim was shot once in his right hip area.  He was rushed to Christiana Hospital and is listed in stable condition.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.
victims.about: Victim was shot once in the hip.

title: Four injured, 1 critically, in Washington St. shooting
location: In the area of 400 block of Washington St., Wilmington, DE 19801
summary:
Police were informed that shots were fire in the 400 Block of N. Washington Street. 

Officer's immediately located a 26-year-old man suffering from gunshot wounds to his abdominal and arm areas. New Castle County Paramedics transported him to the Christiana Hospital Emergency Room in critical condition. 

Assisting officers located three additional victims suffering from apparent gunshot graze wounds or injuries from debris associated with the shooting.. The first, a 33-year-old woman, sustained a graze wound to her neck.  A 35-year-old man was found suffering from a graze wound to his upper left arm and a 40-year-old man was found inside suffering from graze wounds to his right arm and right eye.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.
victims.about: Shot in the abdomen and arm.  Admitted in critical condition.

victims.status: The unidentified woman was wounded during the incident.

title: Questions remain in teen shooting
location: In the area of 701 N. Clayton St., Wilmington, DE 19805
summary:
Wilmington police don't yet know where or why, but they say a 16-year-old boy was shot Friday. 

Around 1:30 p.m., the teen checked himself into St. Francis Hospital with a gunshot wound on his arm.

The teen was described as being in "good condition," according to Wilmington police. 

(Because police did not know where they shooting scene took place, St. Francis Hospital is being identified as the location).

victims.name: Unidentified Bo
victims.status: The unidentified bo was wounded during the incident.

title: Man shot in back in Southbridge
location: 400 block of Townsend St., Wilmington, DE 19801
summary:
A 25-year-old man was shot in the back Sunday night in Wilmington' Southbridge neighborhood. 

Officers responding to the 400 block of Townsend St. in regard to Shot Spotter notification found the wounded man in the 400 block of A St. suffering a gunshot wound to his back. The man was treated by New Castle County Paramedics and  taken to Christiana Hospital, where he was reported to be stable.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.
